frame.name: Frame Frigate
frame.description: A medium-sized, multi-purpose spacecraft, often used for combat, transport, or support operations.

reactor.name: Fission Reactor I
reactor.description: A basic fission power reactor, used to generate electricity from nuclear fission reactions.

engine.name: Ion Drive II
engine.description: An advanced propulsion system that uses ionized particles to generate high-speed, low-thrust acceleration, with improved efficiency and performance.

modules.name: Cargo Hold
modules.description: A module that increases a ship's cargo capacity.

modules.name: Cargo Hold
modules.description: A module that increases a ship's cargo capacity.

modules.name: Crew Quarters
modules.description: A module that provides living space and amenities for the crew.

modules.name: Crew Quarters
modules.description: A module that provides living space and amenities for the crew.

modules.name: Mineral Processor
modules.description: Crushes and processes extracted minerals and ores into their component parts, filters out impurities, and containerizes them into raw storage units.

modules.name: Jump Drive I
modules.description: A basic antimatter jump drive that allows for instantaneous short-range interdimensional travel.

modules.name: Warp Drive I
modules.description: A basic warp drive that allows for short-range interstellar travel.

mounts.name: Sensor Array I
mounts.description: A basic sensor array that improves a ship's ability to detect and track other objects in space.

mounts.name: Mining Laser I
mounts.description: A basic mining laser that can be used to extract valuable minerals from asteroids and other space objects.

mounts.name: Surveyor I
mounts.description: A basic survey probe that can be used to gather information about a mineral deposit.

inventory.name: Antimatter
inventory.description: A highly valuable and dangerous substance used for advanced propulsion and weapons systems.
